name: Walking With The Gods-Lamassu
description:
Part I of a series I intend to do somewhere in the future. What if the gods really visited us? what if God is not just a creation of the mind? How would people in ancient times thought of the power of the cosmos?

A visual experience to absorb through your senses. (I had VR in mind for this, sadly cant afford the equipment to make it, maybe in the future)

Disclaimer: This is not a "game" per se, not much of interaction apart from looking with the mouse. It was intended more as a "digital frame" experience.

Inspired by the song The Arrival Ritual from the Sphynx album from Melechesch. All rights belong to them. This is intended more as a tribute to such an amazing band. Please support them.
